title: LFT - Dedicated player, looking to improve!
body:
I've been playing league since early December and i'm already obsessed with the game, I've been watching plenty LCS, LCK ect, and have been grinding for the past month, as I'm no longer at school and have a lot of free time I'm looking to find a league team and grind with the team, and advance together! 

So if you're interested in trialling me/queueing up with me then add me on LoL my IGN is: Buurnsyy
